description:
Hakumei finds an egg-shaped house with an unexpected resident, and the surprises continue when Iwashi agrees to go on an outing with the girls.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Le salon de coiffure à la coque / Le salon de coiffure à la coque, un autre jour
Tamago no Biyoushi to Yasumi no Hi
The Egg Beautician / A Day Off / The Egg Beautician: Day 2
卵の美容師 と 休みの日
알 속의 미용사 / 쉬는 날 / 알 속의 미용사: 다른 날
